intents.response: Check your account status in the ASTRA app dashboard or call customer care.
The daily withdrawal limit is ₹25,000 for standard cards and ₹50,000 for premium cards.
Use the ASTRA app's 'Find ATM' feature or visit our website to locate ATMs.

patterns: How to report a stolen debit card?
intents.response:
Please block your card immediately via the ASTRA app or call 1800-123-4567.
  • Offline: Report loss at branch with your ID.
  • Online: Use ASTRA app: Cards > Manage > Block Card.

How to do it: Log in to app > Cards > Block or call 1800-123-4567.
Requirements: Your account or card number, identity proof if offline.

patterns: How to check my account balance?
Check balance on my ASTRA account
intents.response: Log in to the ASTRA app or send 'BAL' to 56789 from your registered mobile.

patterns: How long to receive cheque book?
intents.response: You can order a cheque book via net banking, the mobile app, or by visiting the branch.

patterns: Can I close my account online?
I want to close my bank account
Can you help me block my account?
Tell me how to freeze my bank account
intents.response: Please visit your ASTRA branch with ID proof to close your account. Clear all dues before proceeding.

You need a steady income, good credit score, and valid KYC documents to apply.
  • Offline: Apply at your branch with income proof and KYC.
  • Online: Select a card on ASTRA website or app and apply.

How to do it: Apply on ASTRA app or branch with KYC and income proof.
Requirements: PAN, Aadhaar, recent salary slip or bank statement.
Late fee varies by card type but generally starts at ₹200.

patterns: How to make a fixed deposit?
What is the minimum amount for FD?
intents.response: You can open a fixed deposit through the ASTRA mobile app or by visiting your branch.

patterns: How to apply for a home loan?
What is the interest rate for home loan?
intents.response:
Visit our branch with your income and property documents or apply online through our website.
  • Offline: Bring your property docs and KYC to the branch.
  • Online: Apply via app/website with scanned documents and verification.

How to do it: Apply via app/website or visit branch with property documents.
Requirements: Income proof, KYC, property documents, employment proof.

patterns: Process to convert to joint account
Can I open a joint account?
intents.response: Yes, ASTRA allows joint accounts. Both holders must complete KYC and sign the form.

You can update KYC by visiting a branch with your new ID/address proof or through the app.
  • Offline: Carry updated address/ID proof to your branch for verification.
  • Online: Upload updated KYC documents via ASTRA app.

How to do it: Upload documents via app or visit your branch.
Requirements: Updated ID and address proof (e.g., Aadhaar, utility bill).
Repay your loan through the ASTRA app or set up auto-debit using your bank account.

patterns: How to register for mobile banking?
intents.response: The ASTRA mobile app is available on Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

patterns: How to open an NRI account?
intents.response: To open an NRI account, submit passport, visa, and overseas address proof online or at a branch.

patterns: How can I create a new account?
I want to open an account
What's required to open a bank account?
How do I start a new savings account?
I need to open an account
Guide me to open an account
Tell me how to open an account
How do I open an account?
intents.response:
To open an account, visit your nearest ASTRA branch or apply online through our app.
  • Offline: Visit your nearest ASTRA branch with ID and address proof, and a photo.
  • Online: Use ASTRA app or website to apply digitally and complete video KYC.

How to do it: Apply online via the ASTRA app or visit a branch.
Requirements: Valid ID proof (Aadhaar, PAN), address proof, and a passport-size photo.

Apply for a personal loan via our app or at the branch with your ID and income proof.
  • Offline: Visit branch with income and ID proof to apply.
  • Online: Go to ASTRA app > Loans > Apply for Personal Loan.

How to do it: Use ASTRA app or visit branch and submit application with required documents.
Requirements: PAN, Aadhaar, income proof like salary slips or bank statements.
Open a recurring deposit online through the app or at any ASTRA branch.

Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the steps to reset it.
How to do it: Click 'Forgot Password' on login page.
Requirements: Registered mobile/email access to receive OTP.

patterns: Change phone number linked to account
intents.response:
You can update your mobile number by visiting the branch or updating it in net banking under 'Profile'.
  • Offline: Submit a request at your branch with valid ID.
  • Online: Log in to ASTRA Net Banking or App > Settings > Update Mobile.

How to do it: Log in > Settings > Update Mobile or go to branch.
Requirements: Valid ID and the new mobile number.

patterns: How to reset my debit card PIN?
intents.response:
You can reset your debit card PIN at any ASTRA ATM or through the ASTRA mobile app.
  • ATM: Insert card > PIN Services > Reset PIN.
  • App: Log in > Cards > Manage > Reset PIN.
Requirements: Registered mobile for OTP verification.
ASTRA branches are open from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday to Friday, and 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM on Saturdays (except 2nd and 4th Saturdays).

patterns: How to find my branch IFSC code?
intents.response: You can find your branch IFSC code on your cheque book, passbook, or by searching on the ASTRA website.

patterns: How to register for net banking?
intents.response: Register for ASTRA Net Banking online using your account number and registered mobile, or visit your branch for assistance.

patterns: What is the minimum balance for savings account?
intents.response: The minimum balance for a regular ASTRA savings account is ₹5,000. Please check your account type for specific requirements.

patterns: Can I use my card internationally?
intents.response: Yes, you can enable international transactions via the ASTRA app or by contacting customer care. Charges may apply.
You can reach ASTRA customer care at 1800-123-4567 or email support@astra.com.

patterns: How to get my account statement?
intents.response: You can download your account statement from the ASTRA app or net banking portal. Visit your branch for a physical copy.

patterns: How to apply for a locker?
intents.response: Yes, ASTRA offers locker facilities at select branches. Apply at your branch with KYC documents. Allotment is subject to availability.
ASTRA offers special savings accounts for senior citizens with higher interest rates and priority service. Visit your branch with age proof.

patterns: How long does it take to open an account?
intents.response: Account opening usually takes 1-2 working days after document verification. You can check status in the ASTRA app or branch.

patterns: Am I eligible for a loan?
Who can apply for a loan?
intents.response: Eligibility depends on your income, credit score, and documentation. Use the loan eligibility calculator on our website or app.

patterns: What are the current interest rates?
intents.response: Current interest rates are available on the ASTRA website or app. Savings accounts offer up to 3.5% p.a., FDs up to 6.5% p.a.
You can use the EMI calculator in the ASTRA app or website to estimate your monthly payments for loans.
ASTRA offers forex cards and currency exchange at select branches. Apply via the app or visit a forex-enabled branch.

patterns: Update phone number in bank records
intents.response: To change your registered mobile number, visit your branch with valid ID proof or update it via net banking.

patterns: Change email linked to my account
intents.response: You can update your email address in the ASTRA app under Profile > Contact Details or by visiting your branch.

patterns: When will I get my ATM card?
How long does it take to receive debit card?
intents.response: ATM/debit cards are usually delivered within 7 working days after account opening or card request.
If your transaction failed but money was debited, it will be auto-reversed within 3-5 working days. Contact support if not.
Cheque clearance usually takes 2-3 working days. You can check status in the ASTRA app or by contacting your branch.
ASTRA offers savings, current, salary, NRI, and senior citizen accounts. Visit our website or branch for details.

patterns: How to get a premium card?
intents.response: You can request a card upgrade via the ASTRA app or by visiting your branch. Eligibility depends on your account and usage.
Enable SMS alerts for your account in the ASTRA app under Notifications or by submitting a request at your branch.
You can add or update nominee details via the ASTRA app or by submitting a form at your branch with account details.
You can subscribe to e-statements in the ASTRA app or net banking. Statements will be sent monthly to your registered email.
To activate UPI, log in to the ASTRA app, go to UPI section, set a UPI PIN, and link your account. You will need your debit card details for verification.
You can enable balance alerts in the ASTRA app under Notifications or by submitting a request at your branch.
If your ATM card is blocked, visit your nearest ASTRA branch or call customer care to unblock or reissue your card.
You can transfer funds using NEFT, RTGS, IMPS, or UPI through the ASTRA app or net banking. Go to Transfers > Select method > Enter details.
ASTRA offers home loans, personal loans, car loans, education loans, and business loans. Visit our website or branch for details.
If your net banking is locked, use the 'Forgot Password' option or contact customer care to unlock your account.
The first cheque book is free for new accounts. Additional cheque books may incur charges as per ASTRA's schedule of charges.
You can update or link your PAN card in the ASTRA app under Profile > KYC or by submitting a form at your branch.

patterns: What can I do in ASTRA app?
intents.response: The ASTRA app allows you to check balance, transfer funds, pay bills, open deposits, manage cards, and more.
Hello! 👋 How can I assist you with your banking needs today?
Thank you for chatting with Astra Bank. Have a great day! 👋
